content.raw: It will probably mean including the STL resources in the other model, but we can't directly <include> this model because that will pull in the links that we don't want--we'll have to copy the links from this model's SDF. Unless there's a way of including only certain links in SDF, or excluding certain links.
content.html: It will probably mean including the STL resources in the other model, but we can't directly <include> this model because that will pull in the links that we don't want--we'll have to copy the links from this model's SDF. Unless there's a way of including only certain links in SDF, or excluding certain links.
